entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, described as seeing a large woman emerge from the carriage.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A person mentioned by Harry as being similar in size to the large woman. Mentioned as having a height difference of only an inch with her.

entities.name: the largest woman he had ever seen
entities.description: A person described as being extremely large, mentioned by Harry as the largest he has ever seen in his life.

relationships.entity_2: the largest woman he had ever seen

relationships.entity_2: the largest woman he had ever seen
